Articles.Content: I'm looking for a mod that brings in more kerbals than there are already are in the stock game. I want more kerbals than what the game offers so if any of you know a mod that features the ability to bring in more kerbals, reply to this post so I may know.

Clarify what you mean by "brings in more kerbals". Do you want them to have a different looks, different names, doing more jobs, etc. or do you just want to increase the amount of available kerbal for hire every hiring cycle?
Just to generally increase the amount of kerbals. Nothing special, just more kerbals for me to use.
You should probably just hire them in the Astronaut Complex then.. or am I missing something in your request?
Crew Manifest will let you spawn more Kerbals ( and name them ), at least in sandbox.
There is a cloning machine to populate offworld colonies that someone made. I can't remember the precise name of it, but it's somewhere in the Add-On Releases in the past three months.

> 
> There is a cloning machine to populate offworld colonies that someone made. I can't remember the precise name of it, but it's somewhere in the Add-On Releases in the past three months.

ThatÃ‚Â´s not a mod, but if you have crew manifest, you can clone Kerbals using [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36602-Kerbal-Cloning-Machine) technique.

Here's the one I was thinking of: [Moar Kerbals](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104853)
